Why Legos Are So Expensive — And So Popular
December 13, 2012 | NPR · Legos often cost twice as much as similar blocks from a rival toymaker. So why are Legos so much more popular than other brands?

How The Rich Feel About Paying More Taxes
December 13, 2012 | NPR · Many people earning more than $250,000 a year — the 2 percent — admit they can afford to pay more in taxes. However, they don't necessarily like the idea, especially when they're made to feel like skinflints even though they're already sending significant sums to Washington.
